tool_description: Custom Push Notifications For Any App
name: PingBell
title: PingBell

api_list.name: POST Notification
api_list.description: Send an event to your PingBell to trigger a push notification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pingbell.p.rapidapi.com/app.pingbell.io/log?id="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pingbell.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pingbell.p.rapidapi.com/app.pingbell.io/log?id="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pingbell.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
